entities.description: The code representing a specific criminal offense.
A brief description of the specific criminal offense.
The number of occurrences of the offense in the dataset, without weighting.
The percentage of total cases represented by the specific offense.

relationships.description: Associates an offense record with its code.
Provides the description for a particular offense code.
Indicates the unweighted frequency of the offense in the dataset.
Shows the percentage of total cases for a given offense.
